name: Azmodan
title: Lord of Sin
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 damage on impact. Long range.

abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 damage per second and last for 10 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Channel a death beam on an enemy, dealing 100 damage per second. Damage increases over time, to a max of 200 per second, and is increased by 25% against structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.

heroics.name: Demonic Invasion
heroics.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 damage and have 365 health.

heroics.name: Black Pool
heroics.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.
